sentence: This morning, Safeway ( SWY ) declared its quarterly dividend of 23 cents per share, maintaining the amount paid to shareholders the prior quarter.
Based on the current stock price, investors can expect a yield of about 2.7% going forward.
Shares of Safeway were modestly higher on the news.
In other dividend news, Home Depot ( HD ) maintained its quarterly dividend of 47 cents per share.
And Waste Management ( WM ) maintained its quarterly dividend of 37.5 cents per share.
Among dividend increases, the Altria Group ( MO ) announced its quarterly dividend of 52 cents per share, an increase of about 8% over its prior dividend.
And Williams Companies ( WMB ) announced its quarterly dividend of 56 cents per share, an increase of about 32% over its prior dividend.
